toys.name: Teddy Bear
toys.description: A soft and cuddly teddy bear perfect for snuggling. Made from high-quality, hypoallergenic materials, this toy is ideal for children and adults alike.

toys.name: Unicorn
toys.description: A magical plush unicorn with a sparkling horn and colorful mane, sure to bring imaginative play to life. Ideal for gifting and cuddling.

toys.name: Soft Cat
toys.description: This adorable plush cat is the perfect companion for cat lovers. Its soft fur and realistic details make it a favorite for both kids and collectors.

toys.name: Plush Dog
toys.description: A cute and loyal plush dog, always ready for a hug. Its soft material and charming design make it a great friend for children.

toys.name: Bunny
toys.description: This plush bunny is soft and fluffy, with long ears and a friendly face. A perfect gift for Easter or any occasion.

toys.name: Horse
toys.description: A beautifully crafted horse toy with realistic details. Perfect for imaginative farm play and learning about animals.

toys.name: Cow
toys.description: This sturdy cow toy is a great addition to any farm set. With lifelike spots and a gentle expression, it's perfect for kids' farm adventures.

toys.name: Pig
toys.description: A cute and chubby pig toy, great for teaching children about farm life. Its durable build ensures long-lasting play.

toys.name: Chicken
toys.description: A delightful chicken toy that adds realism to farm scenes. Its bright colors and playful design make it a favorite for kids.

toys.name: Sheep
toys.description: A fluffy sheep toy with a friendly face and soft fleece. Great for pretend farm life and educational play.

toys.name: Dinosaur
toys.description: A realistic dinosaur toy that brings prehistoric creatures to life. Perfect for dinosaur enthusiasts and adventurous play.

toys.name: Lion
toys.description: A majestic lion toy with lifelike mane and details. Great for exploring the animal kingdom and inspiring wild play.

toys.name: Elephant
toys.description: This large elephant toy is perfect for jungle and safari adventures. Its realistic size and details make it a favorite for kids.

toys.name: Giraffe
toys.description: A tall giraffe toy with a long neck and detailed spots. Great for educational play and learning about wild animals.

toys.name: Tiger
toys.description: A ferocious tiger toy with sharp stripes and a fierce expression. Ideal for thrilling jungle play and learning about predators.

toys.name: Shark
toys.description: A fearsome shark toy with sharp teeth and realistic fins. Perfect for underwater adventures and shark fans.

toys.name: Octopus
toys.description: This flexible octopus toy features eight bendable arms and lifelike details, bringing the ocean to life in imaginative play.

toys.name: Whale
toys.description: A majestic whale toy with realistic size and detailing. Perfect for ocean-themed play and learning about marine life.

toys.name: Dolphin
toys.description: A friendly dolphin toy with smooth skin and playful features. Great for fun underwater stories and creative play.

toys.name: Crab
toys.description: A colorful crab toy with realistic claws and legs. Ideal for beach-themed adventures and educational play about sea creatures.
